text: Me Akar Dɨkɨrɨzir Gavgavimɨn Boksiam atera Devitɨn Nguibar Ekiamɨn aven izir dughiamɨn, Solɨn guivim Mikal winduan tughav ikia men gari. A uan pam Atrivim Devitɨn garima, a ighiabagh amuava Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn damazimɨn igharagha ighava uabɨ fa uabɨ ekurava, Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn ziam fe. Devit amir arazir kam, Mikal bar a gifongezir puvatɨgha, navir kuram Devitɨn ikia a baseme.
